body.name: Handheld Portable Fan, Foldable 3 IN 1 fan with USB Rechargeable Battery Operated 12-24 Hours Working Time, Personal Quiet Fan With Power Bank, Flashlight Feature Travel Indoor for Women Sister Friend
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 16 mins
features: 【 Long Battery Life】 The rechargeable portable fan built-in 2000mA rechargeable battery. Working Time: about 24 hours(1stspeed), 18 hours(2stspeed),12 hours(3stspeed),so you can enjoy the fan whole day during outdoor/indoor events
【 Power Bank & Flashlight】The portable handheld fan can as a power bank to relieve emergency situation, supplying power for mobile phones. Long press the button to turn on or turn off the flashlight.

【 Safety & Low Noise】 When the body accidentally touches the blade, it will immediately stop running and power off. The smal fan has been improved to reduce the noise and will not cause any impact during use.
【 Foldable & Portable】The size of the pocket fan is only 1.49*1.33*4.6 inch, Weight: 151g. there is no pressure to put it in your pocket or purse.
【AFTER SALES SERVICE】: 30-day money-back guarantee.90-day warranty for a quality-related issue with Free replacement.
body.description: Lagougou 3 IN 1 Portable Foldable Handheld Fan :On-OffKey：Short press this button, the mini foldable fan can be cyclic switching between the 1, 2, 3 speedand shutdown.Long press this button to turn on or off the flashlight function.Charging Indicator：When charging this mini fan, the red light flashes; Full of electricity, the red light long on；When the portable fan power is low, the blue light flashes;This fan to mobile phones, digital products and other equipment charging, the blue light is always on.Function Description：When charging the fan, throductcan only turn on the fan function. When the fan is working, the flashlight function cannot be turned on.When the flashlight is turned on the fan function cannot be turned on either.In order to extend the service life of the battery, when the power is less than 5% the 3 speed cannot be turned on.Product ParameterBattery Capacity: 2000mAhRated Capacity: 6.12Wh/TYP5V/0.5AChargingTime: 3-4hoursInput: DC50V/1.0A(TYP)Output: DC50V/1.0A(TYP)FanWorking Time: about 24 hours(1stspeed) about1 8hours(2nd speed) about12 hours(3 speed)Flashlight Brightness: about 50LMPacking Accessories 1*Fan with lanyard 1*FrostedBag 1*UserManual 1*Micro-USBCharging CableNote： When used by people withlong hair, please keep a distance to prevent the hairinvolved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for a trip to Vegas! I was able to fit this fan in my super tiny crossbody with no problem. The battery lasted fairly long considering how much I used it. The 3rd setting was the most useful in the heat, but I appreciated having options. Didn’t make much use of the power bank aspect, but it’s nice to have. Hopefully I’ll be able to get more use out of it for a while!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love for traveling
reviews.reviewText: perfect portable charger and fan for hot summers

reviews.reviewText: Super light weight and does the job. Fan is super cute, trendy and lasts for a while!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best little fan to keep in my diaper bag for my little!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This pocket fan is like portable air conditioning!
reviews.reviewText: Works great! Gives a lots of air. Love the 3 speeds! It also great to have a flashlight and charging bank all in one! I love this little powerful fan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Gives out lots of cool air, travel friendly, and cute to boot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Replacement broke the 1st day.
reviews.reviewText: It’s functional. However the design is flawed. The small pieces on the side broke off easily. They had already fallen off of the 1st one that I ordered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a must have item!!
reviews.reviewText: I keep one in my purse, my beach bag and car. I use it in restaurants, farmers market, ball games …..It’s great for hot flashes!
